meter_reading.notes: Meter orientation check: BADGER METER text at top, digital display readable left-to-right. White digits (5 digits on left): 0 2 2 7 1 = 2271 m³. Black digit (single digit on right, separated): 2 = 0.2 m³. Red dial analysis: Dial orientation: '0' mark at top of dial (12 o'clock position), '5' mark at bottom of dial (6 o'clock position). Dial number scale position: pointing between 4.5 and 5, approximately 4.7 on the dial face. Clock position: approximately 5:40 o'clock. Degrees: 170° (pointing DOWN-RIGHT, just before 6 o'clock). Verification: Hand is pointing DOWN-RIGHT ✓. Dial reading: 170/3600 = 0.047 m³. Total: 2271.247 m³. Image is slightly blurry but all digits are readable. Red sweep hand position is clear, pointing just before the 5 mark on the dial.
